entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
